reviews:
Just received and tried on. Nice baggy/loose fit, but man, didn't even know u could make a pant this thin.
They are not this thin to save weight. They are this thin because they are cheaply made. Flimsy.
'IF', big IF, I keep them I don't expect them to make it more than a few months before falling apart.
Writing this review, I believe I may have just talked myself out of keeping them.
it does the job, protect me from rain while i cycle, i can squeeze it small and goes over my normal jeans.
for light rain it could do but I was soaking wet under heavy rain.

review_title: Arrived on time, Product appears to be good quality.
reviews: Arrived on time, Product appears to be good quality.
Loose fit. Baggy but does job. Not very thick.
I have used these pants in the rain and they worked perfectly to keep me dry.
